comments:
I had just executed a few JUnit tests and was creating a report.  In the Test Navigator view I right clicked my test and selected Report... from the context menu.  I created a Time Frame Historic report with timeframe of the past month till now and saved it to the root folder of the project.  I clicked finish to generate report.

I got an exception in my log (pasted below) and an error message "org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource /NumbersProj/test2.html does not exist".  But my report titled "test2.html" does exist in my project folder and can be opened and displayed in the editor.

Log error:
